sprites
Class S4P

java.lang.Object
  sprites.S4P
All Implemented Interfaces:
processing.core.PConstants
public class S4P
extends java.lang.Object
implements processing.core.PConstants

This class is used to manage the sprites, it keeps track of all bitmap image files loaded to prevent multiple copies of the same image being loaded. The main methods you are likely to use are update and draw ALL sprites.

Author:
Peter Lager

Field Summary
static int colColor
          Color used to show collision detect area.
static boolean collisionAreasVisible
          If you want to see the collision area for the sprites then set to tru.
This should only be done when testing collision detection because it uses a lot of memory creatin images for pixel-pixel collision areas which is not released even if this is set back to false.
static float deltaTime
          This is a read only attribute and represents the time between frames.
static boolean messages
           
static Domain screenDomain
          Defines that area of the world that is being displayed World coordinates
static int selColor
          Color used to highlight selected sprite Recommend that you use a partially transparent colour.

Field Detail

messages

public static boolean messages

collisionAreasVisible

public static boolean collisionAreasVisible
If you want to see the collision area for the sprites then set to tru.
This should only be done when testing collision detection because it uses a lot of memory creatin images for pixel-pixel collision areas which is not released even if this is set back to false.

colColor

public static int colColor
Color used to show collision detect area. Recommend that you use a partially transparent colour.

selColor

public static int selColor
Color used to highlight selected sprite Recommend that you use a partially transparent colour.

deltaTime

public static float deltaTime
This is a read only attribute and represents the time between frames.

screenDomain

public static Domain screenDomain
Defines that area of the world that is being displayed World coordinates

sortZorder

public static void sortZorder()
Sorts the sprites so they are drawn in z order
Lower Z order values are drawn first. sort

updateTime

public static void updateTime()
Calculate the time (seconds) since this method was last called. Call this just before you call the updateSprites() method.

updateSprites

public static void updateSprites()
Update the position, image animation etc for every sprite based on the time since the last time this method is called. This method should follow after a call to updateTime()

drawSprites

public static void drawSprites()
Called from with the draw() method of your sketch. Causes all visible non-dead sprites to be displayed.

messagesEnabled

public static void messagesEnabled(boolean enable)
S4P has a range of support messages eg
if you create a sprite component without an event handler.
This method allows the user to enable (default) or disable this option. If disable.

Parameters:
enable -
